Walmart.com"/><meta property="og:type" content="product.item"/><meta property="og:image" content="https://i5.walmartimages.com/seo/Burt-s-Bees-Hand-Salve-Hand-Cream-for-Dry-Skin-Herbal-3-oz_fb01b9a5-2390-4b1a-aed4-64ae823b3a9e.23f2472002783dbdedd91b75cd783000.jpeg"/><meta property="og:site_name" content="Walmart.com"/><meta name="robots" content="INDEX,FOLLOW"/><script nonce="wVyap1S0MNReU10W" type="application/ld+json" data-seo-id="schema-org-product">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Product","image":"https://i5.walmartimages.com/seo/Burt-s-Bees-Hand-Salve-Hand-Cream-for-Dry-Skin-Herbal-3-oz_fb01b9a5-2390-4b1a-aed4-64ae823b3a9e.23f2472002783dbdedd91b75cd783000.jpeg","name":"Burt's Bees Hand Salve, Hand Cream for Dry Skin, Herbal, 3 oz","sku":"10317537","gtin13":"792850105997","description":"Moisturize your rough, dry hands with 100% natural origin Burt's Bees Hand Salve. Brimming with botanical oils, herbs and beeswax, this classic hand salve offers skin the hydration it craves with serious nourishment. The light herbal scent makes this moisturizer perfect for both men and women. The travel size tin fits in a pocket or purse for on the go hydration anytime, anywhere. For best results, use the salve daily before and after gardening or any other activity that can be harsh on your hands.","model":"10599","brand":{"@type":"Brand","name":"Burt's Bees"},"offers":[{"@type":"Offer","url":"https://www.walmart.com/ip/Burt-s-Bees-Hand-Salve-Hand-Cream-for-Dry-Skin-Herbal-3-oz/10317537","priceCurrency":"USD","price":10.97,"availability":"https://schema.org/InStock","itemCondition":"https://schema.org/NewCondition","availableDeliveryMethod":"https://schema.org/OnSitePickup"}],"hasMerchantReturnPolicy":{"@type":"MerchantReturnPolicy","applicableCountry":"US","merchantReturnDays":90,"returnFees":"https://schema.org/FreeReturn"},"review":[{"@type":"Review","name":"Non-toxic, deep moisture","datePublished":"August 3, 2025","reviewBody":"This is a wonderful intensive moisturizing. I've used it on heels, cuticles and anywhere winter-dry skin is a problem. It's a better-smelling, non-toxic alternative to Bag Balm.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5,"bestRating":5},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Kate the Innkeeper"}},{"@type":"Review","name":null,"datePublished":"March 5, 2025","reviewBody":"Works great.  Turns my painful cracked knuckles smooth again.  It's a salve not a lotion. A little goes a long way. Also, love the smell.  Everyone in our family of 5 uses it. We use a qtip to scoop out and apply so your fingers dont get sticky.  We typically apply it before bed and keep our hands above the covers til it seems to soak in.  Typically works overnight, maybe 2 when really bad.  Highly recommend it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5,"bestRating":5},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Brian"}},{"@type":"Review","name":"This is the best hand balm.","datePublished":"March 2, 2025","reviewBody":"This does go on greasy, but it soaks in. I rub it into the top of my hands and wipe my palms off on a towel. It creates a barrier on my skin without looking oily that lasts for about five washes before reapplying. Keeps my hands from drying out and cracking.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5,"bestRating":5},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Megan D"}},{"@type":"Review","name":"Burt's Bees Best!","datePublished":"May 17, 2014","reviewBody":"I love this BB product for use on bug bites (takes away the itch, and healing is quick), and helping chapped hands heal. It does take some time to apply, and absorb but it is well worth the time since it works so well. The fragrance is pleasant and not too strong.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5,"bestRating":5},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"FGSLTWHG"}},{"@type":"Review","name":"Burt's Bees","datePublished":"May 8, 2025","reviewBody":"It's a great product, my super dry palm healed, the scent is not great but it goes away in few minutes. I have tried several lotions only Burt's Bees Hand Salve hand cream worked.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5,"bestRating":5},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Eliza"}},{"@type":"Review","name":null,"datePublished":"January 21, 2025","reviewBody":"We love Burts Bees hand salve. It's great for dry cracked hands during the cold winter months. Ordering through the Wal-Mart app is so easy and convenient.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5,"bestRating":5},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Denise"}},{"@type":"Review","name":"Hand Salve, a farmer's friend.","datePublished":"December 23, 2024","reviewBody":"Hand salve is a girls best friend. It's amazing how it heals everything. Skin feels soft, and if there is a scratch or a wound, it heals that as well. As a Doctor of Chinese Medicine I only use natural products, so I have been with Burts Bees from the start, and I will never use anything else but Burts Bees. Don't ever take this product away. Thank you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5,"bestRating":5},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"defaultForRating"}},{"@type":"Review","name":"Too oily and doesn't work","datePublished":"January 15, 2025","reviewBody":"My initial impression was that it was like rubbing Vicks on my hands, but decided, based on other reviews, to give it a chance. I applied it at night and donned cotton gloves for over a week with zero improvement.  I was given a jar of Burt's Bees Almond and Milk Hand Cream for Christmas and after just one night of using it the same way my hands were smoother. I love it!! The  Hand Salve is worthless to me.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"ratingValue":2,"bestRating":5},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Holly"}},{"@type":"Review","name":"MUCH TOO GREASY... ewwwwww. : /","datePublished":"January 25, 2025","reviewBody":"I really love most of Burt's Bees products but for me this one is a no - go.  It goes on like Crisco shortening and feels about the same as that too... I can't imagine doing anything with this greasy substance coating the surface of my skin. Perhaps some of it sinks in the skin but there's way too much left on the skin surface to be practical.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"ratingValue":2,"bestRating":5},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Mark"}},{"@type":"Review","name":"seed oil junk","datePublished":"September 9, 2025","reviewBody":"full of seed oils, false
